sqlquery.name: SQL_SM_SlaOperationActionList.queryList
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ actiontype, actionname, rulename, pri, ordernum, status /*COUNT*/ from (select action.actiontype, action.actionname, slarule.rulename, slarule.pri, slarule.ordernum, slarule.status from bs_t_sm_slasmaction action, bs_t_sm_slarule slarule where action.status = '1' and action.pid = slarule.actionid(+) union all select action.actiontype, action.actionname, slarule.rulename, slarule.pri, slarule.ordernum, slarule.status from bs_t_sm_slamailaction action, bs_t_sm_slarule slarule where action.status = '1' and action.pid = slarule.actionid(+)) where 1=1 $customwhere$ order by ordernum
